A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely incredible movie. Don’t know why everybody seems to be displeased with it. Disney is doing wonderful with the Star Wars franchise. I have watched and been of every Star Wars movie to date with the original trilogy being my favorite by far. I feel like this movie gave exactly what the franchise needed: a refreshing start. In the Force Awakens there was a lot of suspense left hanging for the viewers. So many people speculated what would happen that I came into this movie expecting it to be predictable. It was the polar opposite. I can’t tell you one thing that I predicted correctly about this movie and that’s what I love about it. 10/10\, will be paying to see it again.
